class.name: IOFSR
class.author: Rob lambert
class.desc: Class to store IO information about a job, upgraded EventAccountFSR, needs a special FSRWriter to add file-by-file

enum.desc: FSR status, is the accounting OK
enum.name: StatusFlag

enumval.name: UNRELIABLE
enumval.desc: The counting in this FSR is known to be suspect

enumval.name: EVENTDOUBLED
enumval.desc: Some events have been multiply processed, seen events too large

enumval.name: EVENTSKIPPED
enumval.desc: Some events have been skipped, seen events too small

enumval.name: UNCHECKED
enumval.desc: The counting needs to be checked

enumval.name: VERIFIED
enumval.desc: The counting in all lower FSRs has been verified OK

attribute.desc: Number of events this output file should contain
attribute.name: eventsOutput

attribute.desc: Number of events read over to produce this file
attribute.name: eventsSeen

attribute.desc: list of parent files at this level
attribute.name: filesRead

attribute.desc: maps of ancestor files below this level
attribute.name: provenance

attribute.desc: Map of input files and events written to those files
attribute.name: eventsWrittenTo

attribute.desc: Map of input files and events read in creating those files
attribute.name: eventsSeenBy

attribute.desc: Map of input files and events read from those files
attribute.name: eventsReadFrom

attribute.desc: May be filled with this file's GUID if it is known, almost never known
attribute.name: FID

attribute.desc: Is the FSR reliable? This time, OK wrt streaming. Fill during merging.
attribute.name: statusFlag
